title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish, the JAR packager reports 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: When using the JAR packager on a project, open files are reported very late.
EB: When using the JAR packager on a project, open files should be reported in a timely manner.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a file and make changes without saving.
2. Open the JAR packager for the project.
3. Enter the path, destination, and name for the JAR packager description.
4. Press finish.
